data.message:
Hey Facebook!I have a problem I have been trying to deal with.
There's an impersonator using my pictures to con and defraud people.I have reported the account Severally and have tried getting my friends to report it to no avail.
The user has blocked me so I can't even report it unless indirectly,through a friend. 
I have reported it so many times but it keeps saying that it does not go against community standards. 
Kindly assist and I feel that there should be more scrutiny and stricter measures for such.
Thanks 😊

replies.message: Hi Kareena. Be sure you're selecting "impersonation" when reporting the profile. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2iDns5x. -Brittany

I selected that but still there has been no solution so far.
The account is still up and running
